decisions.name: Compare_Requester_Value_With_Admin_Value
decisions.label: Compare Requester Value With Admin Value

decisions.name: Copy_1_of_Files_to_Attach_Check
decisions.label: Copy 1 of Files to Attach Check

formulas.name: hoursPerBlank
formulas.expression: "This task is performed " + {!How_often_is_this_task_completed} + " and takes approximately " + "x " + "hours per "+ CASE({!How_often_is_this_task_completed}, "Daily","Day", "Weekly","Week", "Monthly","Month", "Quarterly","Quarter", "Yearly","Year","")

formulas.name: submissionText
formulas.expression: "Task description: "+ {!Task_Description} + BR() + BR() + "Frequency: " + IF({!How_often_is_this_task_completed}!="Other","This task is completed " + {!frequencySummary} + IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!further_Details})), ", " + {!further_Details} + BR(),""), {!Details} + BR()) + BR() + "Hours spent: " + TEXT({!hoursSpentVar}) + " per " + {!frequencyYRemoval} + BR() + BR() + "Task complexity: " + TEXT({!complexitySlider.value}) + BR() + BR()+ "Who to notify: " + {!who2Notify.selectedChoiceLabels} + BR() + BR() + IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!This_task_is_still_done_when})),"This task is still completed when: " + {!stillCompletedForm} + BR() + BR(),"") + IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!otherPrograms})),"Additional third party programs, websites, and logins: " + {!otherPrograms}+ BR() + BR(), "") + "SME: " + {!whoIsSME.selectedChoiceLabels} + BR() + BR() + IF({!fileCount}>0,"Attachment(s):" + BR() + {!fileNameList},"NO FILES ATTACHED")

fields.name: fileAlertText
fields.fieldText: A process flow must be attached

fields.name: Copy_1_of_displaySubmissionText
fields.fieldText: {!submissionText}

fields.name: General_Info
fields.fieldText: General Info

fields.name: Department
fields.fieldText: Department

fields.name: Requester
fields.fieldText: Requester

fields.name: Task_Description
fields.fieldText: Task Description

fields.name: How_often_is_this_task_completed
fields.fieldText: How often is this task completed?

fields.name: Details
fields.fieldText: Details
fields.helpText: Three times a week, twice a month, etc.

fields.name: further_Details
fields.fieldText: (Optional) Further details
fields.helpText: Day of the week, time of day, start/end of month, etc.

fields.name: How_many_hours_day
fields.fieldText: How many hours per day are spent on this task?

fields.name: How_many_hours_week
fields.fieldText: How many hours per week are spent on this task?

fields.name: How_many_hours_month
fields.fieldText: How many hours per month are spent on this task?

fields.name: How_many_hours_year
fields.fieldText: How many hours per year are spent on this task?

fields.name: How_many_hours_quarter
fields.fieldText: How many hours per quarter are spent on this task?

fields.name: Details_Files
fields.fieldText: Details & Files

value.stringValue: Please rate the complexity of the task on a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being very simple and 10 being very complex.

fields.name: who2Notify
fields.fieldText: Who should be notified when the task is successful, fails, or runs into any exceptions?

fields.name: This_task_is_still_done_when
fields.fieldText: This task is still done when:

fields.name: otherPrograms
fields.fieldText: Other than Paradigm, what other programs or websites are used? Are additional logins required for any 3rd party websites used to complete this task?

fields.name: whoIsSME
fields.fieldText: Who is the SME for this process?

value.stringValue: Please upload a process flow with all decisions mapped out for this task.

fields.name: textPrompt
fields.fieldText: Please review the information below before submitting

fields.name: displaySubmissionText
fields.fieldText: {!submissionText}

fields.name: displayText1
fields.fieldText:
Success!


New automation case created, #{!automationCaseNumber}. Click here to view.
